text: So this concludes our course on blockchain and cryptocurrency.
We hope you've enjoyed this journey of unpacking and
understanding some of the major components of the space,
including its many challenges and opportunities for innovation.
blockchain technologies are still fairly new and the space is constantly evolving.
Some of the applications we identified for today
might be completely different tomorrow and so forth.
The rate of innovation is really high,
but that's exactly why the space is so exciting.
Regardless of where the technology goes,
its potential to impact our lives is quite high.
We hope you've enjoyed your time with us and can now
evaluate for yourself the potential for this technology.
So thank you, and we look forward to seeing you in one of our future courses.
Thank you all very much for joining us.
